title: Wells Fargo, Trade & Cannabis Industry Growth
itunes:title: Wells Fargo, Trade & Cannabis Industry Growth
description:
Kevin spoke with Adam Hodge, Vice President at SKDKnickerbocker and former DNC Communications Director, Sarah McGregor, Bloomberg News Economic Policy Team Leader, and Joe Lusardi, the CEO of Curaleaf. They discussed Larry Kudlow's comments on trade, Maxine Water's comments on Trump's financials, and the Cannabis industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
